lifeGoals.title: Eat Better
lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Prioritize whole foods, reduce processed options, plan meals ahead, and keep a simple nutrition log.

lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Save for a down payment over the next year, research reliable models, and compare loan rates to secure the best purchase.

lifeGoals.advisorPrompt: AI Plan: Plan a functional layout, gather at least three quotes, and keep a contingency budget for any surprises.
